events.question: Have you gathered the required components?

events.text:
Excellent, my dear assistant!
Please put them into the cauldron and we shall prepare for the next phase of the ritu-
ERM the counter-spell for my grave, grave error!

My dear assistant...
Though not tethered to my corporeal vessel, even I can smell the earthy stink of moss.
Also a Noogut feather is sticking out of your pocket.
Put it all into the cauldron and let us continue on with the ritu-
ERM the counter-spell for my grave, grave error!
